name: ancient
trans: adj. 古代的；古老的，过时的；年老的 n. 古代人；老人

sentences.english: the ancient civilizations of Asia
sentences.chinese: 亚洲的古代文明

sentences.english: an ancient walled city
sentences.chinese: 有城墙的古城

detailed_translations.english: belonging to a time long ago in history, especially thousands of years ago

name: Athens
trans: n. 雅典（希腊首都）

sentences.english: Can you tell me something about the Acropolis in Athens?
sentences.chinese: 你能给我讲一些关于雅典卫城的事吗?

sentences.english: If you’re on a cruise through the Mediterranean, you might only have one day in Athens.
sentences.chinese: 假如你在一个穿越地中海的乘船观光团上，你就大概只能在雅典呆一天。

sentences.english: The best thing for me is that I have equaled what I have done at Athens.
sentences.chinese: 对我来说，最好的事情是，我取得了在雅典曾经取得过的成绩。

name: column
trans: n. 纵队，列；专栏；圆柱，柱形物

sentences.english: He writes a weekly column for ‘The Times’.
sentences.chinese: 他每周为《泰晤士报》写一篇专栏文章。

detailed_translations.english: an article on a particular subject or by a particular writer that appears regularly in a newspaper or magazine

name: geometric
trans: adj. 几何学的；[数] 几何学图形的

sentences.english: a geometric design
sentences.chinese: 几何图形设计

detailed_translations.chinese: 几何学的；[数] 几何学图形的
detailed_translations.english: having or using the shapes and lines in  geometry  , such as circles or squares, especially when these are arranged in regular patterns

name: landmark
trans: n. [航]陆标；地标；界标；里程碑；纪念碑；地界标；划时代的事 adj. 有重大意义或影响的 n. （瑞典、挪）兰德马克（人名）

name: perspective
trans: n. 观点；远景；透视图 adj. 透视的

sentences.english: the artist’s use of perspective
sentences.chinese: 那位画家对透视法的运用

sentences.english: a perspective of the whole valley
sentences.chinese: 山谷全景

sentences.english: His father’s death gave him a whole new perspective on life.
sentences.chinese: 父亲的死使他对生活有了全新的看法。

detailed_translations.english: a method of drawing a picture that makes objects look solid and shows distance and depth, or the effect this method produces in a picture

name: canteen
trans: n. 食堂，小卖部；水壶

sentences.english: Rennie had eaten his supper in the canteen.
sentences.chinese: 伦尼已在食堂吃过晚饭。

detailed_translations.english: a place in a factory, school etc where meals are provided, usually quite cheaply

name: hoarse
trans: adj. 嘶哑的 嘶哑地

sentences.english: He was hoarse from laughing.
sentences.chinese: 他笑得嗓子都沙哑了。

detailed_translations.english: if you are hoarse, or if your voice is hoarse, you speak in a low rough voice, for example because your throat is sore

name: homestead
trans: n. 宅地；家园；田产

sentences.english: He had seen the tribulation of the homestead and mankind from his own tribulation.
sentences.chinese: 海子从自身苦难体验出发目睹了家园和人类苦难。

sentences.english: Heavy clouds hang low over a dilapidated homestead in the Midwest, foretelling a possible tornado.
sentences.chinese: 厚厚的云层低低地悬在中西部残破的宅地上空，预示可能发生龙卷风。

sentences.english: The Xanadu complex is mutual to Shen Congwen and readers, is human's pursuit and expectation to ideal homestead.
sentences.chinese: “桃源”情结是沈从文和读者共有的，是人类对理想家园的追寻和期待。

detailed_translations.english: In United States history, a homestead was a piece of government land in the west, which was given to someone so they could settle there and develop a farm

name: perilous
trans: adj. 危险的，冒险的

sentences.english: a perilous journey across the mountains
sentences.chinese: 穿越群山的危险旅程

detailed_translations.english: very dangerous

name: provisions
trans: n. 规定（provision的复数）；食品；预备 v. 供应补给品；供应粮食（provision的三单形式）

name: atom
trans: n. 原子

sentences.english: carbon atoms
sentences.chinese: 碳原子

detailed_translations.english: the smallest part of an  element  that can exist alone or can combine with other substances to form a  molecule

name: molecule
trans: n. [化学] 分子；微小颗粒，微粒

sentences.english: The molecules of oxygen gas contain just two atoms.
sentences.chinese: 氧分子中只有两个原子。

detailed_translations.english: the smallest unit into which any substance can be divided without losing its own chemical nature, usually consisting of two or more atoms

name: patent
trans: n. 专利权；专利证；专利品 adj. 专利的；特许生产或销售的；显著的；公开的；（脉管等）开放的 v. 取得……的专利权；授予专利

sentences.english: a patent lock
sentences.chinese: 专利锁

sentences.english: He held a number of patents for his many innovations.
sentences.chinese: 他为他的许多革新申请了几项专利。

detailed_translations.english: protected by a patent
A patent is an official right to be the only person or company allowed to make or sell a new product for a certain period of time.

name: physics
trans: n. 物理学；物理现象

sentences.english: ...the laws of physics.
sentences.chinese: …物理学定律。

detailed_translations.english: the science concerned with the study of physical objects and substances, and of natural forces such as light, heat, and movement

name: theory
trans: n. 理论；原理；学说；推测

sentences.english: Freudian theory has had a great influence on psychology.
sentences.chinese: 弗洛伊德理论对心理学产生过巨大影响。

detailed_translations.english: an idea or set of ideas that is intended to explain something about life or the world, especially an idea that has not yet been proved to be true

name: universe
trans: n. 宇宙；世界；领域

sentences.english: Einstein's equations showed the universe to be expanding.
sentences.chinese: 爱因斯坦的方程式表明宇宙正在扩大。

detailed_translations.english: all space, including all the stars and planets

name: aviator
trans: n. 飞行员

sentences.english: In fact, the history of aviator jackets can be traced back to the First World War.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，飞行员夹克的历史可以追溯到第一次世界大战时期。

sentences.english: Other hats are inspired by history and fashion, such as the iconic aviator helmet or the cabbie cap which resembles old fashioned "newsboy" hats.
sentences.chinese: 其他一些帽子则是受了历史或时尚的启发，比如标志性的飞行员头盔，或是与旧风尚‘报童帽’相似的司机帽。

detailed_translations.english: a pilot

name: disappear
trans: vi. 消失；失踪；不复存在 vt. 使…不存在；使…消失

sentences.english: At this point the path seemed to disappear altogether (= disappear completely ) .
sentences.chinese: 小路到这里好像完全消失了。

sentences.english: The two girls disappeared while walking home from school..
sentences.chinese: 这两名女孩在放学回家的路上失踪了。

detailed_translations.english: to become impossible to see any longer

name: legend
trans: n. 传奇；说明；图例；刻印文字 n. (Legend)人名；(西)莱亨德；(英)莱金德

sentences.english: Local legend has it that (= says that ) the island was the original Garden of Eden.
sentences.chinese: 当地传说这个岛就是伊甸园的原型。

detailed_translations.english: an old, well-known story, often about brave people, adventures, or magical events

name: navigator
trans: n. 航海家；领航员；驾驶员

sentences.english: That first citation is from 1557 and comes to us from a great navigator and map maker of the time.
sentences.chinese: 这第一条引证出自1557年，而且它还将一位当时伟大的航海家和地理绘图者带入我们的视野。

name: pilot
trans: n. 飞行员；领航员 adj. 试点的 v. 驾驶；领航；试用 n. (Pilot)人名；(意、印)皮洛特；(法)皮洛

sentences.english: an airline pilot
sentences.chinese: 航空公司飞行员

sentences.english: a fighter pilot
sentences.chinese: 战斗机驾驶员

sentences.english: The official report into the accident says that it was caused by pilot error (= a mistake by the pilot ) .
sentences.chinese: 那宗事故的官方报告称事故是由飞行员失误造成的。

sentences.english: The plan is to launch a pilot programme next summer.
sentences.chinese: 计划是在明年夏天实施一个试验性方案。

detailed_translations.english: someone who operates the controls of an aircraft or spacecraft
A pilot plan or a pilot project is one that is used to test an idea before deciding whether to introduce it on a larger scale
to guide an aircraft, spacecraft, or ship as its pilot

name: barrier
trans: n. 障碍物，屏障；界线 vt. 把…关入栅栏 n. (Barrier)人名；(法)巴里耶

sentences.english: He advocated the removal of trade barriers.
sentences.chinese: 他提倡消除贸易壁垒。

sentences.english: Crowds burst through the barriers and ran onto the pitch.
sentences.chinese: 人群冲破围栏跑进球场。

sentences.english: The mountains form a natural barrier between the two countries.
sentences.chinese: 群山构成了两国之间的天然屏障。

detailed_translations.english: a rule, problem etc that prevents people from doing something, or limits what they can do

name: desertification
trans: n. （土壤）荒漠化；沙漠化（等于desertization）

sentences.english: A third of Africa is under threat of desertification.
sentences.chinese: 三分之一的非洲大陆面临着荒漠化的威胁。

detailed_translations.english: the process by which useful land, especially farmland, changes into desert

name: drought
trans: n. 干旱；缺乏 n. (Drought)人名；(英)德劳特

sentences.english: ...a country where drought and famines have killed up to two million people during the last eighteen years.
sentences.chinese: …过去18年来干旱和饥荒致死达两百万人的一个国家。

detailed_translations.english: a long period of dry weather when there is not enough water for plants and animals to live

name: erosion
trans: n. 侵蚀，腐蚀

sentences.english: the problem of soil erosion
sentences.chinese: 水土流失的问题

sentences.english: the erosion of the coastline
sentences.chinese: 海岸线受到的侵蚀

detailed_translations.english: the process by which rock or soil is gradually destroyed by wind, rain, or the sea

name: fertile
trans: adj. 富饶的，肥沃的；能生育的

sentences.english: the product of a fertile imagination
sentences.chinese: 想象力丰富的产物

detailed_translations.english: (of a person's mind or imagination) that produces a lot of new ideas

name: prosperity
trans: n. 繁荣，成功

sentences.english: a time of economic prosperity
sentences.chinese: 经济繁荣时期

detailed_translations.english: when people have money and everything that is needed for a good life

name: disguise
trans: vt. 掩饰；假装；隐瞒 n. 伪装；假装；用作伪装的东西

sentences.english: He made no attempt to disguise his agitation.
sentences.chinese: 他无意掩饰他的不安。

sentences.english: He is a master of disguise.
sentences.chinese: 他是伪装高手。

detailed_translations.english: to hide sth or change it, so that it cannot be recognized
the art of changing your appearance so that people do not recognize you

name: immortal
trans: adj. 不朽的；神仙的；长生的 n. 神仙；不朽人物

sentences.english: Plato believed that the soul is immortal.
sentences.chinese: 柏拉图认为灵魂不灭。

sentences.english: ...the players considered to be the immortals of the game.
sentences.chinese: …被认为是该运动项目不朽人物的运动员们。

detailed_translations.english: living or continuing for ever
An immortal is someone who will be remembered for a long time

name: mythology
trans: n. 神话；神话学；神话集

sentences.english: characters from classical mythology
sentences.chinese: 古典神话中的人物

detailed_translations.english: set of ancient myths

name: realm
trans: n. 领域，范围；王国

sentences.english: the spiritual realm
sentences.chinese: 精神领域

detailed_translations.english: a general area of knowledge, activity, or thought

name: temple
trans: n. 庙宇；寺院；神殿；太阳穴 n. (Temple)；（法）唐普勒（人名）；（英）坦普尔（人名）

sentences.english: They lighted the temple with many candles.
sentences.chinese: 他们用许多蜡烛照亮这个寺庙。

sentences.english: The entire valley reverberated with the sound of the temple bells.
sentences.chinese: 整个山谷回荡着庙宇的钟声。

sentences.english: After the fire, nothing remained of the magnificent buildings of the temple.
sentences.chinese: 大火过后， 寺院里的那些雄伟建筑已荡然无存。

detailed_translations.english: a building where people go to  worship  , in the Jewish, Hindu, Buddhist, Sikh, and Mormon religions

name: underworld
trans: n. 黑社会；地狱；下层社会；尘世

sentences.english: New York’s criminal underworld
sentences.chinese: 纽约的黑社会

detailed_translations.chinese: 黑社会；地狱；下层社会；尘世
detailed_translations.english: the criminals in a particular place and the criminal activities they are involved in

name: city-state
trans: n. 城邦

name: civilization
trans: n. 文明；文化

sentences.english: modern American civilization
sentences.chinese: 现代美国文明

sentences.english: the ancient civilizations of Greece and Rome
sentences.chinese: 希腊和罗马的古代文明

detailed_translations.english: a society that is well organized and developed, used especially about a particular society in a particular place or at a particular time

name: cuneiform
trans: adj. 楔形文字的；楔形的；楔状骨的 n. 楔形文字；楔状骨

sentences.english: The chicken scratch is cuneiform.
sentences.chinese: 鸡爪印是楔形文字。

sentences.english: She wrote hymns to the gods in cuneiform.
sentences.chinese: 她用楔形文字写下了献给神祇的颂歌。

sentences.english: A 1913 statute, still on the books, sought to thwart propaganda by forbidding the hiring of "publicity experts, " a ban that has as much to do with modern communication as cuneiform tablets.
sentences.chinese: 一项1913年颁布、至今有效的法律旨在通过禁止雇用“公关专家”来阻止宣传，这道禁令涵盖的是从现代通讯到楔形文字泥板的一切。

detailed_translations.chinese: 〔古代美索不达米亚人使用的〕楔形文字的
detailed_translations.english: relating to the writing used by the people of ancient Mesopotamia

name: nomadic
trans: adj. 游牧的；流浪的；游动的

sentences.english: nomadic herdsmen
sentences.chinese: 游牧民

detailed_translations.english: nomadic people are nomads

name: phonologic
trans: adj. 音韵学的；语音体系的

name: pictograph
trans: n. [语] 象形文字；古代石壁画；统计图表

sentences.english: ...a pictogram of a pine tree.
sentences.chinese: …一幅代表一棵松树的象形图画。

detailed_translations.chinese: [语] 象形文字；古代石壁画；统计图表
detailed_translations.english: A pictogram is a simple drawing that represents something. Pictograms were used as the earliest form of writing.

name: donate
trans: vt. 捐赠；捐献 vi. 捐赠；捐献

sentences.english: people who volunteer to donate blood
sentences.chinese: 自愿献血者

detailed_translations.english: to give something, especially money, to a person or an organization in order to help them

name: employment
trans: n. 使用；职业；雇用

sentences.english: She was offered employment in the sales office.
sentences.chinese: 她获聘在销售部工作。

sentences.english: terms and conditions of employment
sentences.chinese: 雇用条款和条件

sentences.english: Steve’s still looking for full-time employment.
sentences.chinese: 史蒂夫还在寻找全职工作。

sentences.english: the needs of women who combine paid employment and care for their families
sentences.chinese: 兼顾有薪工作和照料家庭的女性的需要

detailed_translations.chinese: 工作； 雇用； 使用
detailed_translations.english: the condition of having a paid job

name: found
trans: vt. 创立，建立；创办 v. 找到（find的过去分词）

sentences.english: Founded in 1935 in Ohio, Alcoholics Anonymous is now a world-wide organization.
sentences.chinese: 嗜酒者互诫协会1935年创立于俄亥俄州，现在是一个世界性的组织。

sentences.english: Eton College was founded by Henry VI in 1440.
sentences.chinese: 伊顿公学于1440年由亨利六世创办。

detailed_translations.english: to start something such as an organization, company, school, or city, often by providing the necessary money

name: industry
trans: n. 产业；工业；勤勉

sentences.english: I work in the oil industry.
sentences.chinese: 我在石油行业工作。

sentences.english: Italy’s thriving tourist industry
sentences.chinese: 意大利蓬勃发展的旅游业

sentences.english: Gould is a man of great industry.
sentences.chinese: 古尔德是一个很勤劳的人。

detailed_translations.english: businesses that produce a particular type of thing or provide a particular service

name: investment
trans: n. 投资；投入；封锁

sentences.english: We plan to buy some property as an investment.
sentences.chinese: 我们打算买些房地产作为投资。

sentences.english: a huge investment of time and effort
sentences.chinese: 时间和精力的大量投入

detailed_translations.english: the use of money to get a profit or to make a business activity successful, or the money that is used

name: promote
trans: vt. 促进；提升；推销；发扬 vi. 成为王后或其他大于卒的子

sentences.english: You don't have to sacrifice environmental protection to promote economic growth.
sentences.chinese: 你们没有必要牺牲环保来促进经济增长。

detailed_translations.english: If people promote something, they help or encourage it to happen, increase, or spread

name: blacksmith
trans: n. 铁匠；锻工

sentences.english: In my youth my father bound me to a blacksmith.
sentences.chinese: 在我年轻时我父亲立契让我给一名铁匠当学徒。

sentences.english: The smith [blacksmith] forges horseshoes with great skill.
sentences.chinese: 这个铁匠锻制马掌的手艺很高。

sentences.english: A hammer, pliers and an anvil - the main tools of a blacksmith.
sentences.chinese: 铁匠使用的重要工具：一把大锤、一把铁钳和一个大铁墩

detailed_translations.english: someone who makes and repairs things made of iron, especially  horseshoe s

name: famine
trans: n. 饥荒；饥饿，奇缺

sentences.english: the great potato famine in Ireland
sentences.chinese: 爱尔兰严重的土豆荒

sentences.english: A million people are facing famine .
sentences.chinese: 一百万人正面临饥荒。

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which a large number of people have little or no food for a long time and many people die

name: immigrant
trans: adj. 移民的；迁入的 n. 移民，侨民

sentences.english: an illegal immigrant
sentences.chinese: 非法移民

sentences.english: a new wave of immigrants from the Middle East
sentences.chinese: 来自中东的一股新兴的移民浪潮

detailed_translations.english: someone who enters another country to live there permanently

name: makings
trans: n. 素质；材料；制作物（making的复数）

name: mast
trans: n. 桅杆；柱；橡树果实 vt. 在…上装桅杆 n. (Mast)人名；(德、英、法、西、芬)马斯特

sentences.english: While a ketch offers these advantages to cruisers, they may also be more expensive because of the added mast and sail.
sentences.chinese: 尽管双桅帆给水手们提供了这些优势，它们也因为这额外的桅杆和船帆而造价更加昂贵。

sentences.english: She says the boat would be shaped like a capsule, powered by a small nuclear engine, and though there would be no sail, it would have a mast to hold a camera.
sentences.chinese: 斯托芬表示，探测船将被制成胶囊状，并由一个小型核动力引擎驱动，尽管不会有帆，但船上会有一个固定照相机的桅杆。

sentences.english: She has also studied everything from how to stitch her own wounds to how to cope with sleep deprivation and how to put out fires on board her 11.5-metre twin-mast ketch.
sentences.chinese: 她还学习了相关知识，从如何缝合伤口，到如何应付睡眠不足的状况，再到如何扑灭高11.5米的双桅杆帆船上的火情，可谓应有尽有。

detailed_translations.english: a tall pole on which the sails or flags on a ship are hung
to equip with a mast or masts

name: yardarm
trans: n. [船] 桁端；横杆端

name: apprentice
trans: n. 学徒；生手 vt. 使…当学徒 vi. 当学徒

sentences.english: The apprentice lingered his work.
sentences.chinese: 这个徒弟磨洋工。

sentences.english: His apprentice always leaves the tools about.
sentences.chinese: 他的徒弟老是乱放工具。

sentences.english: That would be good for my apprentice to have, complementary.
sentences.chinese: 补充说一下，那会是成为我徒弟的优势。

name: colony
trans: n. 殖民地；移民队；种群；动物栖息地

sentences.english: Algeria was formerly a French colony.
sentences.chinese: 阿尔及利亚以前是法国的殖民地。

detailed_translations.english: a country or area that is under the political control of a more powerful country, usually one that is far away

name: delegate
trans: n. 代表，会议代表；委员会成员 v. 授（权），把……委托给他人；委派……为代表，任命

sentences.english: Around 350 delegates attended the conference.
sentences.chinese: 大约有350名代表参加了大会。

detailed_translations.english: someone who has been elected or chosen to speak, vote, or take decisions for a group

detailed_translations.chinese: 委派…为代表； 授 ， 把…委托给
detailed_translations.english: to choose someone to do a particular job, or to be a representative of a group, organization etc

sentences.chinese: 德克萨斯州展出包括了一个黑曜石面具，可能是从埃及被带到哈喇和林来的，莱塞姆说。

sentences.chinese: 员工拒绝调动岗位是违反合约的。

trans: n. 证据，证明；迹象；明显 vt. 证明

sentences.chinese: 我们找到了进一步证实这种理论的科学根据。

detailed_translations.english: a fierce person or animal is angry or ready to attack, and looks very frightening

sentences.chinese: 寄宿学校严格的生活规律

trans: n. 名声，名誉；声望

sentences.chinese: 艾丽斯•门罗有文风抑郁的名声。

trans: adj. 严峻的；严厉的；剧烈的；苛刻的

sentences.chinese: 他的伤势很严重。

sentences.chinese: 她患有严重的抑郁症。

sentences.chinese: 这场暴风雨造成了严重的破坏。

name: aerodynamics
trans: n. 空气动力（特性）；空气动力学

sentences.chinese: 飞机的超音速和空气动力学完成将空气压缩入引擎的任务。

sentences.english: And besides, the principles of aerodynamics and radar-deflection know no political borders.
sentences.chinese: 此外，空气动力学和雷达隐形技术的原理并无政治壁垒。

sentences.english: The flight path was as planned, and preliminary feedback from the engineers was that it matched the model aerodynamics performance and guidance and control very well.
sentences.chinese: 从工程师那里得到的初步反馈表明试验机符合模型的空气动力学性能，并且导航和操纵都十分出色。

detailed_translations.english: the scientific study of how objects move through the air

name: altitude
trans: n. 高地；高度；[数] 顶垂线；（等级和地位等的）高级；海拔

sentences.chinese: 那架飞机已经达到了大约三万九千英尺的巡航高度。

detailed_translations.english: the height of an object or place above the sea

sentences.chinese: 别拖延时间，快回答我的问题！

sentences.english: He was just stalling for time .
sentences.chinese: 他只是在拖延时间。

sentences.chinese: 他往后一闪，躲避再次捅来的一刀。

sentences.chinese: 她挤进了人群。

If you thrust your way somewhere, you move there, pushing between people or things which are in your way

sentences.chinese: 比如困难之一就是：每当我们的眼球移动时，视网膜上的影像也在移动。

sentences.english: There are sensory neurons, which take information from the world so as you see me, for instance, there are neurons firing from your retina sending signals to your brain.
sentences.chinese: 感觉神经元,负责收集外界信息,比如,当你看到我的时候,视网膜上的神经元会产生神经冲动,将刺激信号传递到你的大脑

sentences.english: A tiny electronic pad is placed onto the retina of one eye, so that the electrodes are in direct contact with the ganglion cells.
sentences.chinese: 一个微小的电子衬垫被放置在单侧眼睛的视网膜上，这样电极就可以与神经节细胞直接接触了。

sentences.chinese: 我如释重负，我们又避免了一场财政危机。

sentences.chinese: 石油公司因在20世纪70年代的石油危机中赚取了丰厚利润而受到严厉抨击。

sentences.chinese: 汽车工业现在正处于危机之中。

sentences.chinese: 侦察任务

sentences.chinese: 监视和侦察等战时任务

sentences.chinese: 不要屈服于只抽一支烟的诱惑。

sentences.chinese: 美国航空航天局已经启动了一个为期10年的寻找外星生物的项目。

sentences.chinese: …包括引起结核病和麻风病的微生物在内的一类细菌。

sentences.chinese: 在阵亡之前他奉命执行过200多次军事任务。

detailed_translations.english: an important job that involves travelling somewhere, done by a member of the air force, army etc, or by a spacecraft

trans: n. 漫游者；流浪者；漂泊者；巡视器 n. (Rover)人名；(英)罗弗；(意)罗韦尔

detailed_translations.english: a person who roves; wanderer

trans: n. 适应；改编；改编本，改写本

sentences.chinese: 布拉纳因他对莎士比亚的《亨利五世》的荧幕改编而获了两次奖。

sentences.chinese: 我们必须为子孙后代保护林地。

sentences.english: efforts to conserve fish stocks
sentences.chinese: 保护鱼类资源的努力

detailed_translations.english: to protect something and prevent it from changing or being damaged

name: environment
trans: n. 环境，外界

sentences.english: Some of these chemicals are very damaging to the environment.
sentences.chinese: 这些化学品中有些对环境非常有害。

sentences.english: legislation to protect the environment
sentences.chinese: 保护环境的法规

sentences.english: the effects of acid rain on the environment
sentences.chinese: 酸雨对环境的影响

sentences.chinese: 负责环境事务的政府部长

name: evaporate
trans: vt. 使……蒸发；使……脱水；使……消失 vi. 蒸发，挥发；消失，失踪

sentences.chinese: 大部分的水都蒸发了。

sentences.english: The sun evaporates moisture on the leaves.
sentences.chinese: 太阳会蒸发叶子上的水分。

detailed_translations.english: if a liquid evaporates, or if heat evaporates it, it changes into a gas
if a liquid evaporates, or if heat evaporates it, it changes into a gas

trans: n. [化学] 沉淀，[化学] 沉淀物；降水；冰雹；坠落；鲁莽

detailed_translations.chinese: [化学] 沉淀，[化学] 沉淀物；降水；冰雹；坠落；鲁莽
detailed_translations.english: rain, snow etc that falls on the ground, or the amount of rain, snow etc that falls

trans: n. 腹部；下腹；腹腔

sentences.chinese: 他去了医院接受对他的腹部疼痛进行的各项检查。

sentences.chinese: 这可以控制液体的吸收。

detailed_translations.chinese: 吸收；全神贯注，专心致志

name: gastric
trans: adj. 胃的；胃部的

sentences.english: gastric ulcers
sentences.chinese: 胃溃疡

detailed_translations.english: relating to your stomach

name: nutrient
trans: n. 营养物；滋养物 adj. 营养的；滋养的

sentences.english: The plant absorbs nutrients from the soil.
sentences.chinese: 植物从土壤中吸取养分。

trans: n. 唾液；涎 n. (Saliva)人名；(俄)萨利瓦

sentences.english: He noticed a lot of saliva settling in his mouth.
sentences.chinese: 他注意到有很多唾液滞留在他的嘴里。

detailed_translations.english: the liquid that is produced naturally in your mouth

trans: n. 地震；大动荡

sentences.english: An earthquake measuring 6.1 on the Richter scale struck southern California on June 28.
sentences.chinese: 6月28日加州南部地区发生了里氏6.1级地震。

sentences.english: The city is in an earthquake zone.
sentences.chinese: 该市位于地震带。

detailed_translations.english: a sudden shaking of the earth’s surface that often causes a lot of damage

name: fault
trans: n. 故障；[地质] 断层；错误；缺点；毛病；（网球等）发球失误 vi. 弄错；产生断层 vt. （通常用于疑问句或否定句）挑剔

sentences.english: I’m really sorry - it’s all my fault.
sentences.chinese: 我真的很抱歉——都是我的错。

sentences.chinese: 那天晚上我没有睡好，但这是我自己的问题。

name: magma

sentences.english: The volcano threw new showers of magma and ash into the air.
sentences.chinese: 这座火山向空气中喷发了新的岩浆和火山灰。

detailed_translations.english: hot melted rock below the surface of the Earth

sentences.chinese: 你能从电视上海啸和地震的生还者的脸上看到这点。

sentences.chinese: 他们敦促其他没有受到地震和海啸影响的城镇居民也这样做。

sentences.english: But I am lucky because we did get a little bit of the tsunami but nothing like what they got up north.
sentences.chinese: 但我算是幸运的因为我们这只受到了海啸很小的侵害远不及北方所受到的那样。

detailed_translations.english: a very large wave, caused by extreme conditions such as an  earthquake  , which can cause a lot of damage when it reaches land

name: volcano
trans: n. 火山

sentences.english: Pompeii was destroyed when the volcano erupted in 79 AD.
sentences.chinese: 庞贝城于公元79年在火山爆发中毁灭。

detailed_translations.english: a mountain with a large hole at the top, through which lava is sometimes forced out

name: alternative
trans: adj. 供选择的；选择性的；交替的 n. 二中择一；供替代的选择

sentences.english: An alternative route is along the Via Unione.
sentences.chinese: 另一条路线是沿着联合路走。

detailed_translations.chinese: 两者选一的， 供选择的； 另类的
detailed_translations.english: an alternative idea, plan etc is different from the one you have and can be used instead

detailed_translations.chinese: 替换物，选择；选择的自由
detailed_translations.english: something you can choose to do or use instead of something else

name: efficient
trans: adj. 有效率的；有能力的；生效的

sentences.english: a very efficient secretary
sentences.chinese: 效率高的秘书

sentences.english: an efficient use of land
sentences.chinese: 土地的有效使用

sentences.english: Lighting is now more energy efficient.
sentences.chinese: 如今的照明设备更加节能。

detailed_translations.english: if someone or something is efficient, they work well without wasting time, money, or energy

name: emissions
trans: n. [环境] 排放；[环境] 排放物，辐射；发行（emission的复数形式）

name: exhaust
trans: v. 使精疲力尽；耗尽；彻底探讨；排出（气体） n. 废气；排气管

sentences.english: A full day’s teaching exhausts me.
sentences.chinese: 讲一整天课令我精疲力竭。

sentences.english: We are in danger of exhausting the world’s oil supply.
sentences.chinese: 我们面临世界石油储备耗尽的危险。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone feel extremely tired

name: hybrid
trans: n. 杂种，混血儿；混合物 adj. 混合的；杂种的

sentences.english: hybrid architecture
sentences.chinese: 具有混合风格的建筑

sentences.english: ...the hybrid corn seed.
sentences.chinese: …杂交玉米种子。

detailed_translations.english: an animal or plant produced from parents of different breeds or types
Hybrid is also an adjective

name: audience
trans: n. 观众；听众；读者；接见；正式会见；拜会

sentences.english: The show attracts a regular audience of about 20 million.
sentences.chinese: 这个节目吸引了大约两千万固定观众收看。

sentences.english: Goya was one of the first painters to look for a wider audience for his work.
sentences.chinese: 戈雅是最早为自己的作品寻找更多观赏者的画家之一。

detailed_translations.english: the people who watch or listen to a particular programme, or who see or hear a particular artist’s, writer’s etc work

name: competition
trans: n. 竞争；比赛，竞赛

sentences.english: Going to trade fairs is an ideal opportunity to size up the competition .
sentences.chinese: 参加商品交易会是估量竞争规模的理想机会。

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which people or organizations try to be more successful than other people or organizations

name: contestant
trans: n. 竞争者；争辩者

sentences.english: Column 5 displays only one contestant—the winner of the entire tournament.
sentences.chinese: 第 5 列只显示了一个竞争者 — 整个锦标赛的获胜者。

detailed_translations.english: someone who competes in a contest

name: international
trans: adj. 国际的；国际通用的 n. 国际体育比赛（选手）；外国人 n. (International) 共产国际（组织）

sentences.english: the response of the international community
sentences.chinese: 国际社会的反响

sentences.english: the UN and other international organizations
sentences.chinese: 联合国和其他国际组织

detailed_translations.english: relating to or involving more than one nation

name: lyrics
trans: n. 歌词；抒情诗（lyric的复数）

sentences.english: ...Kurt Weill's Broadway opera with lyrics by Langston Hughes.
sentences.chinese: …由兰斯顿·休斯作词的库尔特·韦尔的百老汇歌剧。

detailed_translations.english: The lyrics of a song are its words

name: trophy
trans: n. 奖品；战利品；纪念品 vt. 用战利品装饰 adj. 显示身份的；有威望的 n. (Trophy)人名；(法)特罗菲

sentences.english: A lion’s head was among the trophies of his African trip.
sentences.chinese: 他非洲之行的战利品之一是个狮头。

detailed_translations.english: something that you keep to prove your success in something, especially in war or hunting

name: circumnavigate
trans: vt. 环航

sentences.english: For this year at least, our race to circumnavigate the globe in less than 80 days is over.
sentences.chinese: 至少在今年，我们在八十天内完成环球航行结束了。

detailed_translations.english: to sail, fly, or travel completely around the Earth, an island etc

name: expedition
trans: n. 远征；探险队；迅速

sentences.english: an expedition to the North Pole
sentences.chinese: 北极探险

sentences.english: another Qomolangma expedition
sentences.chinese: 又一次珠穆朗玛峰探险

detailed_translations.english: a long and carefully organized journey, especially to a dangerous or unfamiliar place, or the people that make this journey

name: mutiny
trans: n. 兵变；叛乱；暴动 vi. 反叛；暴动；参加叛乱

name: navigation
trans: n. 航行；航海

sentences.english: compasses and other instruments of navigation
sentences.chinese: 罗盘及其他导航仪器

detailed_translations.chinese: 航行， 航海， 航空； 导航， 领航
detailed_translations.english: the science or job of planning which way you need to go when you are travelling from one place to another

name: sanitation
trans: n. [医] 环境卫生；卫生设备；下水道设施

sentences.english: Overcrowding and poor sanitation are common problems in prisons.
sentences.chinese: 过度拥挤和卫生状况差是监狱里的普遍问题。

detailed_translations.english: the protection of public health by removing and treating waste, dirty water etc

name: disrepair
trans: n. 失修，塌毁；破损

name: Islam
trans: n. 伊斯兰教 n. (Islam)人名；(阿拉伯、巴基、孟)伊斯兰

sentences.english: He converted to Islam at the age of 16.
sentences.chinese: 他在16岁时皈依了伊斯兰教。

detailed_translations.english: the Muslim religion, which was started by Muhammad and whose holy book is the Quran (Koran)

name: minaret
trans: n. 尖塔

name: mosque
trans: n. 清真寺

sentences.english: Would you go to church or the synagogue or the mosque?
sentences.chinese: 你会去教堂，犹太教会，或者清真寺吗？

sentences.english: If there is to be a new city church, they argue, then why not a mosque?
sentences.chinese: 他们置疑说，如果要修建一个新的城市教堂为什么不能是座清真寺呢？

sentences.english: Tell the congregation of a church or mosque that existence is too vulgar an attribute to fasten onto their God, and they will brand you an atheist.
sentences.chinese: 告诉教堂或清真寺的会众们，存在，是强加在他们的上帝身上的一种过于庸俗的属性，他们将会指责你为无神论者。

detailed_translations.english: a building in which Muslims worship

name: preserve
trans: vt. 保存；保护；维持；腌；禁猎 n. 保护区；禁猎地；加工成的食品；（某人或群体的）专门活动

sentences.english: We must encourage the planting of new trees and preserve our existing woodlands.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须鼓励栽种新树木，同时也要保护现有的林地。

detailed_translations.english: to save something or someone from being harmed or destroyed

name: sculpted
trans: adj. 雕刻般的，雕塑般的（指外观线条清晰、表面光滑） v. 雕刻， 雕塑；使具有某种形状，使成形（sculpt 的过去式和过去分词）

name: cunning
trans: adj. 狡猾的；巧妙的；可爱的 n. 狡猾

sentences.english: a cunning opponent
sentences.chinese: 狡猾的对手

detailed_translations.english: someone who is cunning is clever and good at deceiving people in order to get what they want
the ability to achieve what you want by deceiving people in a clever way

name: exploit
trans: vt. 开发，开拓；剥削；开采 n. 勋绩；功绩

sentences.english: the urgent need to exploit the resources of the Irish Sea
sentences.chinese: 开发爱尔兰海资源的迫切需要

detailed_translations.english: to develop and use minerals, forests, oil etc for business or industry

name: mischief
trans: n. 恶作剧；伤害；顽皮；不和

sentences.english: Now run along, and don’t get into mischief .
sentences.chinese: 好了，走开，不要捣乱。

sentences.english: They’ve got enough toys to keep them out of mischief for a while.
sentences.chinese: 他们有足够的玩具玩，暂时不会捣蛋。

sentences.english: If you can’t see Nick, you can be sure he’s up to some mischief (= behaving badly and causing trouble or damage ) .
sentences.chinese: 要是看不到尼克，就可以肯定他又在捣什么鬼了。

detailed_translations.english: bad behaviour, especially by children, that causes trouble or damage, but no serious harm

name: mythical
trans: adj. 神话的；虚构的

sentences.english: a mythical creature like the Minotaur
sentences.chinese: 像弥诺陶洛斯这类神话故事中的怪物

detailed_translations.english: existing only in an ancient story

name: Polynesian
trans: adj. 波利尼西亚的；波利尼西亚人的 n. 波利尼西亚人

sentences.english: Allegiance to chiefs was a fundamental of Polynesian culture.
sentences.chinese: 效忠首领是波利尼西亚人最基本的文化。

sentences.english: It is possible that Polynesian rats, arriving with human settlers, may have eaten enough seeds to help to decimate the trees.
sentences.chinese: 有可能是与人类共同达到该岛的波利尼西亚鼠类，吃掉了大量的种子促成了棕榈树的大批死亡。

sentences.english: Polynesian society blossomed in this unlikely locale after hardy souls somehow navigated a fleet of wooden outrigger canoes to this tiny speck in the vastness of the Pacific Ocean.
sentences.chinese: 在一群勇敢的人们驾驶着一队独木舟来到广阔的太平洋上的这个小岛上，一个波利尼西亚社会开始在这个不可思议的位置繁荣了起来。

detailed_translations.chinese: 波利尼西亚人, 波利尼西亚语
detailed_translations.english: a member of the people that inhabit Polynesia, generally of Caucasoid features with light skin and wavy hair

name: trickster
trans: n. 骗子；魔术师

name: GPS
trans: abbr. 全球定位系统（Global Position System）；通用雷达（General Purpose Radar）；炮长主瞄准镜（Gunner's Primary Sight）

sentences.english: With GPS, they also now know where you are whenever you have your phone.
sentences.chinese: 利用全球定位系统，只要你带着电话，他们就知道你在哪里。

sentences.english: Used in combination with GPS, an accelerometer, a compass and the gyroscope can be used for in indoor navigation with floor accuracy.
sentences.chinese: 与全球定位系统、加速度计、陀螺仪和指南针结合使用，可用于具有地面精度的室内导航。

sentences.english: There are already USB GPS devices for tracking where you’ve been but here’s another device that will instead keep track of what the temperature was, if for some reason you need to know.
sentences.chinese: 已经有USB全球定位系统设备以追踪你的位置所在。 但是，如果你因某个原因需要知道温度的话,还有一个设备可以代替来追踪记录温度。

detailed_translations.english: a system that uses radio signals from  satellites  to show your exact position on the Earth on a special piece of equipment

name: host
trans: n. [计] 主机；主人；主持人；许多 vt. 主持；当主人招待 vi. 群集；做主人

sentences.english: Which country is going to host the next World Cup?
sentences.chinese: 哪个国家将主办下一届世界杯？

detailed_translations.english: to provide the place and everything that is needed for an organized event

name: online
trans: adj. 联机的；在线的 adv. 在线地

sentences.english: All the city’s schools will be online by the end of the year.
sentences.chinese: 到年底，市里的所有学校都会连接因特网。

sentences.english: ...the cool stuff you find online.
sentences.chinese: …你在网上找到的好东西。

detailed_translations.english: connected to other computers through the Internet, or available through the Internet
While connected to a computer or under computer control.

name: website
trans: n. 网站（全球资讯网的主机站）

sentences.english: For more information on weight loss and healthy eating, visit our website.
sentences.chinese: 有关减肥和健康饮食的更多信息，请访问我们的网站。

detailed_translations.chinese: 网站（全球资讯网的主机站）
detailed_translations.english: a place on the Internet where you can find information about something, especially a particular organization

name: carnivore
trans: n. [动] 食肉动物；食虫植物

sentences.english: This is a delicious vegetarian dish that even carnivores love.
sentences.chinese: 这是一道肉食者们都喜欢的美味素食。

detailed_translations.english: an animal that eats flesh

name: fused
trans: adj. （电器）装有保险丝的 v. （使）融合，熔接；（使）熔化；（使保险丝熔断而）停止工作；安装保险丝（fuse 的过去式和过去分词）

name: herbivore
trans: n. [动] 食草动物

sentences.english: The meat of the herbivore is, in comparison, far more edible , smellwise.
sentences.chinese: 相对地，食草动物的肉闻起来要好些，更易食用。

sentences.english: I only eat vegetables (scientists call me a herbivore) -- almost always leaves from the tops of trees.
sentences.chinese: 我只吃蔬菜(科学家称我为草食动物)—几乎常常是树梢的叶子。

sentences.english: You probably would call me a vegetarian. But scientists call me a herbivore because I only eat leaves, grass and other plants.
sentences.chinese: 可能你会说我是素食者，但科学家称我为草食动物，因为我只吃叶子、草和其它植物。

detailed_translations.english: an animal that only eats plants

name: omnivore
trans: n. [动] 杂食动物；不偏食的人

sentences.english: But I don’t care if you’re an omnivore.
sentences.chinese: 但是我也不会介意你是否是杂食动物。

sentences.english: He's an 18)omnivore, and what a trainer would call food-driven.
sentences.chinese: 他是杂食动物，驯兽师称之为“食物驱动型”。

detailed_translations.chinese: [动] 杂食动物；不偏食的人
detailed_translations.english: an animal that eats both meat and plants

name: ungulate
trans: adj. 有蹄的；像蹄子的 n. 有蹄类动物

name: evacuate
trans: vt. 疏散，撤退；排泄 vi. 疏散；撤退；排泄

sentences.english: Police evacuated the area.
sentences.chinese: 警方将该地区人员全部疏散。

detailed_translations.english: to send people away from a dangerous place to a safe place

name: eye
trans: n. 眼睛；视力；眼光；见解，观点 vt. 注视，看 n. (Eye)人名；(德)艾厄；(英)艾

sentences.english: He’s got beautiful eyes.
sentences.chinese: 他有一双漂亮的眼睛。

sentences.english: There were tears in her eyes as she listened to the story.
sentences.chinese: 她听故事时眼里噙着泪水。

sentences.english: A surgeon needs a good eye and a steady hand.
sentences.chinese: 做外科医生眼要准，手要稳。

detailed_translations.english: one of the two parts of the body that you use to see with

name: intensity
trans: n. 强度；强烈；[电子] 亮度；紧张

sentences.english: The intensity of the hurricane was frightening.
sentences.chinese: 飓风的猛烈程度令人恐惧。

detailed_translations.chinese: 强烈，剧烈；〔光、声等的〕强度
detailed_translations.english: the quality of being felt very strongly or having a strong effect

name: antibody
trans: n. [免疫] 抗体

sentences.english: Such women carry antibodies which make their blood more likely to clot during pregnancy.
sentences.chinese: 这样的女性携带在孕期使她们的血液更可能凝结的抗体。

detailed_translations.english: a substance produced by your body to fight disease

name: exposure
trans: n. 暴露；曝光；揭露；陈列

sentences.english: Prolonged exposure to the sun can cause skin cancer.
sentences.chinese: 长时间晒太阳会导致皮肤癌。

sentences.english: the exposure of his underground political activity
sentences.chinese: 对他地下政治活动的揭露

sentences.english: The failure of their marriage has got a lot of exposure recently.
sentences.chinese: 他俩婚姻失败一事最近被频频曝光。

detailed_translations.english: when someone is in a situation where they are not protected from something dangerous or unpleasant

name: germ
trans: n. [植] 胚芽，萌芽；细菌 vi. 萌芽

sentences.english: Put disinfectant down the toilet to kill any germs.
sentences.chinese: 在抽水马桶里投放消毒剂杀菌。

sentences.english: germ cells containing DNA
sentences.chinese: 含DNA的生殖细胞

detailed_translations.english: a very small living thing that can make you ill

name: pandemic
trans: adj. （疾病）在全国（或世界）流行的 n. （全国或全球性）流行病，瘟疫

sentences.english: As announced earlier this month, the world is at the start of the 2009 influenza pandemic.
sentences.chinese: 正如我们在本月初宣布的那样，世界已进入2009年流感大流行初期。

sentences.english: WHO will be able to revise its estimate of pandemic vaccine supply once it has the new yield information.
sentences.chinese: 一旦有新的产量信息，世卫组织将能够修订其对大流行性流感疫苗供应的估算。

sentences.english: These recommendations are prudent measures which can limit the spread of many communicable diseases and not only the pandemic (H1N1) 2009 virus.
sentences.chinese: 这些建议均为审慎措施，可以限制许多传染病，不仅仅是2009年H1N1流感大流行病毒的传播。

name: vaccine
trans: n. 疫苗；牛痘苗 adj. 疫苗的；牛痘的

sentences.english: a polio vaccine
sentences.chinese: 小儿麻痹症疫苗

sentences.english: Doctors worried that there would not be enough vaccine for everyone who needed it.
sentences.chinese: 医生担心没有足够的疫苗给每个需要的人。

detailed_translations.english: a substance which contains a weak form of the bacteria or virus that causes a disease and is used to protect people from that disease

name: accelerate
trans: vt. 使……加快；使……增速 vi. 加速；促进；增加

sentences.english: measures to accelerate the rate of economic growth
sentences.chinese: 加快经济增长速度的措施

detailed_translations.english: if a process accelerates or if something accelerates it, it happens faster than usual or sooner than you expect

name: aeronautics
trans: n. 航空学；飞行术

sentences.english: Although it was a great hobby for her, she wanted to study aeronautics or astronomy as a career.
sentences.chinese: 不过这只是她一大爱好，她本想学习航空或天文作为职业。

detailed_translations.english: the science of designing and flying planes

name: hostile
trans: adj. 敌对的，敌方的；怀敌意的 n. 敌对

sentences.english: Southampton fans gave their former coach a hostile reception .
sentences.chinese: 南安普敦队的球迷对球队的前任教练很不友善。

sentences.english: Carr wouldn’t meet Feng’s stare, which was openly hostile .
sentences.chinese: 卡尔不愿意面对冯公然敌视的目光。

sentences.english: his hostile attitude
sentences.chinese: 他敌对的态度

detailed_translations.english: angry and deliberately unfriendly towards someone, and ready to argue with them

name: invaluable
trans: adj. 无价的；非常贵重的

sentences.english: The internet is an invaluable source of information.
sentences.chinese: 因特网是十分有价值的信息来源。

detailed_translations.chinese: 非常宝贵的， 极为贵重的， 无价的
detailed_translations.english: extremely useful

name: obsessed
trans: adj. 着迷的；无法摆脱的，受困扰的 v. 着迷；纠缠，困扰（obsess 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.english: He was obsessed with gangster movies.
sentences.chinese: 他那时迷上了警匪片。

detailed_translations.english: If someone is obsessed with a person or thing, they keep thinking about them and find it difficult to think about anything else

name: aquatic
trans: adj. 水生的；水栖的；在水中或水面进行的 n. 水上运动；水生植物或动物 n. (Aquatic)人名；(法)阿卡蒂克

sentences.english: an aquatic plant
sentences.chinese: 水生植物

detailed_translations.chinese: 水生的；水栖的；在水中或水面进行的
detailed_translations.english: living or growing in water

detailed_translations.chinese: 水上运动；水生植物或动物

name: current
trans: adj. 现在的；流通的，通用的；最近的；草写的 n. （水，气，电）流；趋势；涌流 n. (Current)人名；(英)柯伦特

sentences.english: the current President
sentences.chinese: 现任总统

sentences.english: In its current state, the car is worth £1,000.
sentences.chinese: 这辆车按现在的车况来看值1,000英镑。

detailed_translations.english: happening or existing now

name: depression

trans: vt. 使溶解；使分解；使液化 vi. 溶解；解散；消失 n. 叠化画面；画面的溶暗

trans: vt. 修改；改善，改进 vi. 改正，改善；改过自新 n. (Amend)人名；(德、英)阿门德

sentences.chinese: 该法律经修改把女性也包括在内。

sentences.chinese: 被告后来修改了证词。

sentences.chinese: “史蒂夫偷的——应该说是借的。”他改口道。

detailed_translations.english: to correct or make small changes to something that is written or spoken

trans: n. 委员会

sentences.english: a committee meeting
sentences.chinese: 委员会会议

detailed_translations.english: a group of people chosen to do a particular job, make decisions etc

trans: n. 辩论；（正式的）讨论 v. （尤指正式）讨论，辩论；仔细考虑

sentences.chinese: 这种新药成了医学界激烈争论的话题。

sentences.english: There was much lively debate about whether women should spend more time in the home.
sentences.chinese: 就妇女是否应该花更多时间待在家里这个话题有许多热烈的争论。

sentences.english: A fierce debate raged over which artist’s work should be chosen for the prize.
sentences.chinese: 就哪位艺术家的作品应该得奖一事展开了激烈的争论。

sentences.english: The issue will be debated on Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 这个问题将在星期二讨论。

detailed_translations.english: discussion of a particular subject that often continues for a long time and in which people express different opinions
to discuss a subject formally when you are trying to make a decision or find a solution

name: legislative
trans: adj. 立法的；有立法权的 n. 立法权；立法机构

sentences.chinese: 新的议会将没有立法权。

sentences.english: new legislative measures to stem the flow of drugs into the US
sentences.chinese: 遏制毒品流入美国的新的立法措施

detailed_translations.english: concerned with making laws

name: Senate
trans: n. 参议院，上院；（古罗马的）元老院

trans: adj. 干旱的；不毛的，[农] 荒芜的

sentences.chinese: 五大湖中的水被输往干旱地区。

detailed_translations.chinese: 干旱的；不毛的，[农] 荒芜的

sentences.chinese: 例句：这座建筑物不符合安全条例。

sentences.chinese: 一个很有修养的人

detailed_translations.chinese: 发展（cultivate的过去分词）；耕作；教化

detailed_translations.chinese: 本土的；土著的；国产的；固有的

sentences.chinese: 一个叫“海豚族”的澳大利亚土著部落

detailed_translations.english: a social group consisting of people of the same  race  who have the same beliefs, customs, language etc, and usually live in one particular area ruled by their leader

trans: n. 制图师；地图制作者

sentences.english: This is my survey of a tumultuous landscape, done with all the uncertainty of a cartographer who does not know exactly where the boundaries of revolt begin and end.
sentences.chinese: 这就是我对这片动荡之地的调查，在调查中制图师完全不能确定起义发生和结束的界限范围。

sentences.chinese: 据爱心人士创建的网站“泰坦尼克号百科全书”(Encyclopedia Titanica，简称为ET)记载，迪安曾于二战期间在政府中担任制图师一职，之后为一家工程公司工作。

sentences.english: Suppose you're a cartographer or geographic information system (GIS) professional, working on behalf of one, or an advanced hobbyist and want to bring in multiple datasets from a variety of sources.
sentences.chinese: 假设您是一名制图师或地理信息系统（GIS）专业人士，或是一名资深的爱好者，想要将不同来源的数据集中在一起。

detailed_translations.english: A cartographer is a person whose job is drawing maps

sentences.english: Large firms benefit from economies of scale (= ways of saving money because they are big ) .

to climb to the top of something that is high and difficult to climb

trans: n. 调查；测量；审视；纵览 vt. 调查；勘测；俯瞰 vi. 测量土地

sentences.chinese: 被调查的 100 家公司中，10% 的公司营业额在 5,000 万到 9,900 万英镑之间。

sentences.english: She turned to survey her daughter’s pale face.
sentences.chinese: 她转过头审视女儿苍白的面容。

sentences.english: We conducted a survey of parents in the village.
sentences.chinese: 我们对这个村子的孩子父母作了一次调查。

sentences.chinese: 我转动着我的旋转椅同一旁的吉姆聊起天来了。

sentences.chinese: 一座巨大的休眠火山

sentences.chinese: 观察自然生活环境中的猴子

sentences.chinese: 圣物的神奇力量

sentences.chinese: 有些动物被认为是神圣的。

sentences.chinese: 两位总统商定在春天举行一次首脑会议。

sentences.chinese: …森林生态系统。

name: equator

sentences.chinese: 美国位于赤道以北。

name: ban

sentences.english: Smoking is banned in the building.
sentences.chinese: 大楼内禁止吸烟。

sentences.english: I read the first draft and thought it was very good.

sentences.english: All parties eventually approved the final draft (= finished form ) of the peace treaty.
sentences.chinese: 各方最后都同意了和平条约的终稿。

to write a plan, letter, report etc that will need to be changed before it is in its finished form

sentences.chinese: 政府已承诺继续打击种族歧视。

sentences.english: the problem of racism in schools
sentences.chinese: 学校里的种族歧视问题

detailed_translations.chinese: 种族主义，种族歧视；人种偏见
detailed_translations.english: unfair treatment of people, or violence against them, because they belong to a different race from your own

name: segregation
trans: n. 隔离，分离；种族隔离

sentences.english: The Supreme Court unanimously ruled that racial segregation in schools was unconstitutional.
sentences.chinese: 最高法院一致裁定学校实施的种族隔离措施违反宪法。

detailed_translations.english: when people of different races, sexes, or religions are kept apart so that they live, work, or study separately

name: afterlife
trans: n. 来世；死后的生活

detailed_translations.english: the life that some people believe people have after death

name: embalmer
trans: n. （用于防止尸体腐化的）香料或化学物质

name: hieroglyph
trans: n. 象形文字；图画文字；秘密符号

sentences.english: Initially the patterns I used were hieroglyph like symbols.
sentences.chinese: 我所采用的图案是类似符号的象形文字。

sentences.english: In the Late Period, the hieroglyph of the bird was used to represent this deity directly.
sentences.chinese: 在后来的时期内，鸟的象形文字直接用来表现神。

sentences.english: Initially the patterns I used were hieroglyph like symbols. After a holiday in the Maldives the "face" patterns developed. The local fishes gave me endless inspiration.
sentences.chinese: 我所采用的图案是类似符号的象形文字。在马尔代夫度假后，这些“脸”的图形开始发展。那里的鱼类给了我无穷无尽的灵感。

detailed_translations.chinese: 象形文字, 图画文字
detailed_translations.english: a picture or symbol used to represent a word or part of a word, especially in the ancient Egyptian writing system

name: immortality
trans: n. 不朽；不朽的声名；不灭

sentences.english: the immortality of the soul
sentences.chinese: 灵魂的不朽

detailed_translations.english: the state of living for ever or being remembered for ever

name: mummify
trans: vt. 将…做成木乃伊；使干瘪；弄干保存 vi. 成木乃伊状；干瘪

name: acrostic
trans: n. 离合诗 adj. 离合诗的

name: discover
trans: vt. 发现；发觉 vi. 发现

sentences.english: The body was discovered in a field.
sentences.chinese: 尸体是在一块田地里找到的。

sentences.english: Forest Service crews often discover campfires that have not been put out completely.
sentences.chinese: 林务局工作人员常常发现未完全熄灭的营火。

detailed_translations.english: to find someone or something, either by accident or because you were looking for them

name: mystery
trans: n. 秘密，谜；神秘，神秘的事物；推理小说，推理剧；常作 mysteries 秘技，秘诀

sentences.english: Twenty years after the event, his death remains a mystery .
sentences.chinese: 事情过去二十年了，他的死仍然是个谜。

sentences.english: The way her mind worked was always a mystery to him.
sentences.chinese: 她脑子里在想些什么对他来说始终是个谜。

sentences.english: ‘Why did he do it?’ ‘I don’t know. It’s a complete mystery .’
sentences.chinese: “他为什么这么做？” “我不知道，这完全是个谜。”

sentences.english: The police never solved the mystery of Gray’s disappearance.
sentences.chinese: 警察一直没有侦破格雷失踪的谜案。

sentences.english: But why would anyone want to kill Jack? The mystery deepened .
sentences.chinese: 但为什么会有人想杀死杰克呢？疑团越来越深了。

sentences.english: What happened to the paintings after that is an unsolved mystery .
sentences.chinese: 后来那些画的命运如何是个不解之谜。

sentences.english: I don’t know how he got the job – it’s one of life’s little mysteries .
sentences.chinese: 我不知道他是怎么得到那份工作的——那永远是个小小的谜。

sentences.english: How life began on Earth is one of the great mysteries of science.
sentences.chinese: 地球生命的起源是一大科学谜团。

detailed_translations.english: an event, situation etc that people do not understand or cannot explain because they do not know enough about it

name: pattern
trans: n. 模式；图案；样品 vt. 模仿；以图案装饰 vi. 形成图案

sentences.english: Weather patterns have changed in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 气候模式近年已经发生了变化。

sentences.english: A general pattern began to emerge .
sentences.chinese: 一个总体模式开始显现。

sentences.english: Their descriptions seemed to follow a set pattern (= always develop in the same way ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们的描述似乎依据固定的模式。

sentences.english: His behavior fits a pattern of violent acts.
sentences.chinese: 他的举动符合暴力行为的模式。

sentences.english: a dress pattern
sentences.chinese: 连衣裙的纸样

detailed_translations.english: the regular way in which something happens, develops, or is done

name: riddle
trans: n. 谜语；神秘事件；（筛分土石的）粗筛 v. 在……上弄许多小洞；充斥，布满；用粗筛筛；摇动（炉栅）使灰落下；出谜；为（某人）解（谜） n. (Riddle)（美、英、加）里德尔（人名）

sentences.english: See if you can solve this riddle .
sentences.chinese: 看看你能不能猜出这个谜语。

detailed_translations.english: to solve, explain, or interpret (a riddle or riddles)

detailed_translations.chinese: 谜语；粗筛；谜一般的人、东西、事情等
detailed_translations.english: a question that is deliberately very confusing and has a humorous or clever answer

name: apartheid
trans: n. 种族隔离

sentences.english: He praised her role in the struggle against apartheid.
sentences.chinese: 他赞扬了她在反对种族隔离制的斗争中所起的作用。

detailed_translations.english: Apartheid was a political system in South Africa in which people were divided into racial groups and kept apart by law

name: boycott
trans: v. 联合抵制；拒绝购买；拒绝参加 n. 联合抵制 n. (Boycott) 博伊科特（人名）

sentences.english: We boycott all products tested on animals.
sentences.chinese: 我们抵制所有拿动物做试验的产品。

sentences.english: They are now trying to organize a boycott.
sentences.chinese: 他们正试图组织一场抵制行动。

detailed_translations.english: to refuse to buy something, use something, or take part in something as a way of protesting
an act of boycotting something, or the period of time when it is boycotted

name: colonize
trans: vt. 将…开拓为殖民地；移于殖民地；从他地非法把选民移入 vi. 开拓殖民地；移居于殖民地

sentences.english: a dead tree that has been colonized by ants
sentences.chinese: 被蚂蚁占据的一棵死树

detailed_translations.chinese: 将…开拓为殖民地；移于殖民地；从他地非法把选民移入
detailed_translations.english: to establish political control over an area or over another country, and send your citizens there to settle

name: dignity
trans: n. 尊严；高贵

sentences.english: We do this because we believe in the dignity and value of every person.
sentences.chinese: 我们这样做是因为我们相信每个人的尊严和价值。

sentences.english: They have to be treated well, with dignity.
sentences.chinese: 必须善待申请人，让人有尊严。

sentences.english: This award must be shared with everyone who strives for justice and dignity.
sentences.chinese: 我一定要与所有为正义和尊严奋斗的人分享此奖。

detailed_translations.english: the ability to behave in a calm controlled way even in a difficult situation

name: protest
trans: n. 抗议，反对；（多来自公证人）拒付证书 v. 抗议，反对；坚决表示，断言；拒付

sentences.english: ‘I don’t see why I should take the blame for this!’ she protested.
sentences.chinese: “我不明白为什么我要对此承担责任！”她抗议道。

detailed_translations.english: to come together to publicly express disapproval or opposition to something
something that you do to show publicly that you think that something is wrong and unfair, for example taking part in big public meetings, refusing to work, or refusing to buy a company’s products

name: reconciliation
trans: n. 和解；调和；和谐；甘愿

sentences.english: Her ex-husband had always hoped for a reconciliation.
sentences.chinese: 她的前夫一直想和她重归于好。

sentences.english: The treaty has brought a new spirit of reconciliation on both sides.
sentences.chinese: 条约使双方产生了新的和解精神。

sentences.english: The leadership announced a programme of national reconciliation (= an attempt by all sides to end a war or trouble in a country ) .
sentences.chinese: 领导层宣布了一个国内各方和解方案。

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which two people, countries etc become friendly with each other again after quarrelling

name: architect
trans: n. 建筑师 缔造者

sentences.english: But I am an architect.
sentences.chinese: 但是我是一名建筑师。

sentences.english: They commissioned an architect to design the new library.
sentences.chinese: 他们委托一位建筑师设计这座新图书馆。

sentences.english: The building was constructed from the design of that architect.
sentences.chinese: 这幢大楼是按那位建筑师的设计建造的。

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to design buildings

name: complex
trans: adj. 复杂的；合成的 n. 复合体；综合设施

sentences.english: a complex system of highways
sentences.chinese: 复杂的公路网

sentences.english: Photosynthesis is a highly complex process.
sentences.chinese: 光合作用是一个非常复杂的过程。

sentences.english: Peter seemed to have an instant understanding of the most complex issues.
sentences.chinese: 再复杂的问题彼得似乎也是一看就明白。

sentences.english: It was a very complex relationship between two complex people.
sentences.chinese: 这是两个复杂的人之间非常复杂的关系。

detailed_translations.chinese: 由许多部分组成的，复合的；复杂的，难懂的
detailed_translations.english: consisting of many different parts and often difficult to understand

detailed_translations.chinese: 综合体， 集合体； 情结， 夸大的情绪反应
detailed_translations.english: a group of buildings, or a large building with many parts, used for a particular purpose

name: iconic
trans: adj. 偶像的，图符的；与图像有关的，图像性的；以传统风格刻画得胜运动员的

name: innovation
trans: n. 创新，革新；新方法

sentences.english: We must encourage innovation if the company is to remain competitive.
sentences.chinese: 公司要想保持竞争力，就必须鼓励革新。

sentences.english: recent innovations in English teaching
sentences.chinese: 英语教学的新创举

detailed_translations.english: the introduction of new ideas or methods

name: skeleton
trans: n. 骨架，骨骼；纲要；骨瘦如柴的人 adj. 骨骼的；骨瘦如柴的；概略的

sentences.english: We agreed on a skeleton outline of the proposal.
sentences.chinese: 我们给提案商定了一个基本框架。

detailed_translations.chinese: 骨架，骨骼；纲要；骨瘦如柴的人
detailed_translations.english: the most important parts of something, to which more detail can be added later

detailed_translations.chinese: 骨骼的；骨瘦如柴的；概略的

name: cipher
trans: n. 密码；暗号；零 vi. 使用密码；计算；做算术 vt. 计算；做算术；将…译成密码

sentences.english: an expert in ciphers
sentences.chinese: 密码专家

sentences.english: messages written in cipher
sentences.chinese: 用密码写的信息

detailed_translations.english: a system of secret writing

name: cooperate
trans: vi. 合作，配合；协力

sentences.english: They agreed to co-operate with Brazil on a programme to protect the rain forests.
sentences.chinese: 他们同意和巴西合作进行一个保护热带雨林的项目。

sentences.english: I advised my client to cooperate fully with the police.
sentences.chinese: 我建议我的当事人要全力与警方配合。

detailed_translations.english: to work with someone else to achieve something that you both want

name: detention
trans: n. 拘留；延迟；挽留

sentences.english: ...the detention without trial of government critics.
sentences.chinese: …对政府批评者未经审判而进行的关押。

detailed_translations.english: the state of being kept in prison

name: elaborate
trans: adj. 精心制作的；详尽的；煞费苦心的 vt. 精心制作；详细阐述；从简单成分合成（复杂有机物） vi. 详细描述；变复杂

sentences.english: pure silks embroidered with elaborate patterns
sentences.chinese: 绣有精美图案的真丝衣服

sentences.english: A spokesman declined to elaborate on a statement released late yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 发言人拒绝对昨天晚些时候发表的一份声明作出更多说明。

detailed_translations.chinese: 复杂的； 精心制作的
detailed_translations.english: having a lot of small parts or details put together in a complicated way
If you elaborate on something that has been said, you say more about it, or give more details

name: economics
trans: n. 经济学；国家的经济状况

sentences.english: a Harvard professor of economics
sentences.chinese: 哈佛大学的经济学教授

detailed_translations.english: the study of the way in which money and goods are produced and used

name: nominate
trans: vt. 推荐；提名；任命；指定

sentences.english: Ferraro was the first woman to be nominated for the job of vice president.
sentences.chinese: 费拉罗是第一位获得副总统职位提名的女性。

sentences.english: Next year Mr Jenks will retire and Mr Broadbent will be nominated as his replacement.
sentences.chinese: 明年詹克斯先生退休，布罗德本特先生将获任命接替他的职位。

detailed_translations.english: to officially suggest someone or something for an important position, duty, or prize

name: physiology
trans: n. 生理学；生理机能

sentences.english: a book on biochemistry and physiology
sentences.chinese: 一本关于生物化学和生理学的书

detailed_translations.english: the science that studies the way in which the bodies of living things work

name: scholar
trans: n. 学者；奖学金获得者

sentences.english: a Shakespearean scholar
sentences.chinese: 研究莎士比亚的学者

detailed_translations.english: someone who knows a lot about a particular subject, especially one that is not a science subject

name: algae
trans: n. [植] 藻类；[植] 海藻

sentences.english: ...an effort to control toxic algae in Green Lake.
sentences.chinese: …控制绿湖里有毒水藻的努力。

detailed_translations.english: a very simple plant without stems or leaves that grows in or near water

name: biome
trans: n. [生态] 生物群系；[生态] 生物群落区

sentences.english: Covering parts of Bolivia, Paraguay and Argentina, it is a mix of forest, palm woodland, shrubby steppe, and swamp. It is the second largest biome in South America after Amazonia.
sentences.chinese: 该地区横跨玻利维亚、巴拉圭和阿根廷等三个国家，森林、棕榈林地、灌木草原和沼泽相互交错，生物群落规模在南美仅次于亚马逊。

sentences.english: The most striking example of this involved the acidifying effects of elevated atmospheric carbon dioxide on coral reefs in the sphere’s ocean biome.
sentences.chinese: 其中最引人注目的例子涉及到大气二氧化碳含量的升高对生物圈内海洋生物群落里的珊瑚礁的酸化影响。

sentences.english: With no fisheries to be evaluated, Austria's 100 score on biome protection gets a greater weighting.9. Cuba
sentences.chinese: 由于没有参与渔业评估，奥地利在生物群落保护方面得到的100分对其综合得分影响很大。

detailed_translations.english: a type of environment that is described according to the typical weather conditions and plants that exist there

name: marine
trans: adj. 船舶的；海生的；海产的；航海的，海运的 n. 海运业；舰队；水兵；（海军）士兵或军官 n. (Marine)人名；(西)马里内；(英)马林

sentences.english: the enormous variety of marine life
sentences.chinese: 海洋生物繁多的种类

sentences.english: the effects of oil pollution on marine mammals
sentences.chinese: 石油污染对海洋哺乳动物的影响

sentences.english: marine biology
sentences.chinese: 海洋生物学

detailed_translations.english: relating to the sea and the creatures that live there

name: seamount
trans: n. 海底山

name: tide
trans: n. 趋势，潮流；潮汐 vt. 随潮漂流

sentences.english: Is the tide going out or coming in ?
sentences.chinese: 现在是退潮还是涨潮？

sentences.english: We went for a walk and got cut off by the tide .
sentences.chinese: 我们去散步，结果被潮水困住了。

detailed_translations.english: the regular rising and falling of the level of the sea

name: trench
trans: n. 沟，沟渠；战壕；堑壕 vt. 掘沟 vi. 挖战壕；侵害 n. (Trench)人名；(英、西)特伦奇

sentences.english: Orders came that we should spade the trench in an hour.
sentences.chinese: 有命令要我们必须在一小时内挖好战壕。

sentences.english: From nine to eleven he planned to dig a hole, or trench, and possibly find something good to eat buried in the dirt.
sentences.chinese: 九点到十一点，他打算挖一个洞，或者一条小沟也行，没准儿还能从脏土里翻出什么好吃的呢。

sentences.english: The bridge lies like a trench in the fortress of the moat, which is shaped to blend in with the outlines of the landscape.
sentences.chinese: 这座桥就像是坐落在护城河中的一条沟渠，这种造型是为了使它与周围的风景融合在一起。

detailed_translations.english: a long narrow hole dug into the surface of the ground

name: archaeologist
trans: n. 考古学家

sentences.english: In fact, she was an archaeologist.
sentences.chinese: 其实她是一个考古学家。

sentences.english: But I do not believe, as a field archaeologist, that we can use the scientific method to prove or disprove [them].
sentences.chinese: 但作为一个在现场工作的考古学家，我不相信我们能用科学手段对它们进行证实或证伪”。

name: athlete
trans: n. 运动员，体育家；身强力壮的人

sentences.english: a professional athlete
sentences.chinese: 一位专业运动员

detailed_translations.english: someone who competes in sports competitions, especially running, jumping, and throwing

name: ceremony
trans: n. 典礼，仪式；礼节，礼仪；客套，虚礼

sentences.english: a wedding ceremony
sentences.chinese: 婚礼

sentences.english: the opening ceremony of the Olympic Games
sentences.chinese: 奥运会开幕式

sentences.english: The queen was crowned with due ceremony.
sentences.chinese: 女王按照规定的礼仪加冕。

detailed_translations.english: an important social or religious event, when a traditional set of actions is performed in a formal way

name: competitor
trans: n. 竞争者，对手

sentences.english: Last year they sold twice as many computers as their competitors.
sentences.chinese: 去年他们的计算机销量是竞争对手的两倍。

detailed_translations.english: a person, team, company etc that is competing with another

name: procession
trans: n. 队伍，行列；一列，一排；列队行进 vi. 列队行进 vt. 沿著……行进

sentences.english: They marched in procession to the Capitol building.
sentences.chinese: 他们列队向国会大厦行进。

detailed_translations.chinese: 队伍，行列；一列，一排；列队行进
detailed_translations.english: a line of people or vehicles moving slowly as part of a ceremony

name: qualify
trans: vt. 限定，修饰；使具有资格；证明…合格 vi. 取得资格，有资格

sentences.english: Free school lunches are given to children who qualify.
sentences.chinese: 符合条件的儿童可获得免费的学生午餐。

detailed_translations.english: to have the right to have or do something, or to give someone this right

name: abode
trans: n. 住处；营业所 v. 遵守；停留；忍受（abide的过去分词）

sentences.english: Welcome to my humble abode.
sentences.chinese: 欢迎光临寒舍。

sentences.english: a homeless person with no fixed abode
sentences.chinese: 居无定所的无家可归者

detailed_translations.english: someone’s home – sometimes used humorously

detailed_translations.chinese: 遵守；停留；忍受（abide的过去分词）

name: delirious
trans: adj. 发狂的；神志昏迷的；精神错乱的

sentences.english: I was delirious and blacked out several times.
sentences.chinese: 我当时神志不清，几次昏过去。

detailed_translations.chinese: 发狂的；神志昏迷的；精神错乱的
detailed_translations.english: Someone who is delirious is unable to think or speak in a sensible and reasonable way, usually because they are very ill and have a fever

name: disorienting
trans: v. （使）迷失方向；（使）迷惑（disorient 的现在分词，disorient 等于 disorientate） adj. 迷失方向的

name: intricate
trans: adj. 复杂的；错综的，缠结的

sentences.english: intricate patterns
sentences.chinese: 繁复的图案

detailed_translations.chinese: 错综复杂的， 复杂精细的
detailed_translations.english: containing many small parts or details that all work or fit together

name: triumphant
trans: adj. 成功的；得意洋洋的；狂欢的

sentences.english: the triumphant army
sentences.chinese: 得胜的军队

sentences.english: I feel exhausted, but also triumphant.
sentences.chinese: 我感到很疲倦，但也很得意。

detailed_translations.english: having gained a victory or success

name: turmoil
trans: n. 混乱，骚动

sentences.english: She lived through the turmoil of the French Revolution.
sentences.chinese: 她经历过法国大革命的混乱之后仍旧活着。

detailed_translations.english: a state of confusion, excitement, or anxiety

name: corpse
trans: n. 尸体

sentences.english: The corpse was found by children playing in the woods.

sentences.chinese: 小林先生被选中代表公司出席会议。

sentences.english: New technology is going to revolutionize everything we do.
sentences.chinese: 新科技将彻底改变我们做的每一件事。

sentences.english: His work revolutionized the treatment of this disease.
sentences.chinese: 他的研究成果给这种疾病的治疗带来了革命。

sentences.chinese: ...一条古罗马时代的高架渠。

detailed_translations.english: a structure like a bridge, that carries water across a river or valley

sentences.english: Offered the position of chairman, Smith declined, preferring to keep his current job.
sentences.chinese: 对担任主席的邀约，史密斯拒绝了，他宁愿留在现在的职位上。

sentences.chinese: 玛丽谢绝了热饮料，到自己的房间去了。

sentences.english: The minister declined to comment (= refused to speak to people who report the news ) about the progress of the peace talks.
sentences.chinese: 部长拒绝就和谈进程发表评论。

name: solstice
trans: n. 至，至日；至点

trans: vt. 美化；使有魅力

sentences.chinese: 有人指责电视美化犯罪。

sentences.english: A test satellite was launched from Cape Canaveral.
sentences.chinese: 一颗实验人造卫星从卡纳维拉尔角发射升空。

sentences.chinese: 为了筹集15万美元，该组织发起了一场募捐活动。

sentences.english: The Canadian police plan to launch an investigation into the deal.

sentences.chinese: 几伙吵闹的年轻人

someone who behaves in a rough noisy way

sentences.chinese: 我们驾车向内地开了约1小时，进入了一个放羊的大牧场。

sentences.chinese: 大片起伏的山地牧场

sentences.english: the lush pastures of the southern counties

sentences.chinese: 东南亚的传统

sentences.english: the tradition that the eldest son inherits the property

sentences.chinese: 马丁揭示，在哪些可以追溯到祖先的线粒体基因上，有75%或更多的成分来自当时外来的细菌而非宿主细胞。

sentences.english: You can only explain this by evolutionary common ancestry.
sentences.chinese: 你只能通过存在“进化上的共同祖先”来解释。

detailed_translations.english: the members of your family who lived a long time ago

detailed_translations.chinese: 主权；主权国家；君主；独立国

sentences.chinese: 英国的近海水域

sentences.english: the coastal path
sentences.chinese: 海滨小道

detailed_translations.english: in the sea or on the land near the coast

detailed_translations.english: the feathers covering a bird’s body

sentences.chinese: 一个F-15战斗机中队正在返程途中。

detailed_translations.chinese: 空军中队；一群；骑兵中队；分遣队；小舰队

sentences.chinese: 我认为有许多濒临灭绝的动物，如老虎和大熊猫，在世界。

sentences.chinese: 我认为政府应该严厉惩罚那些捕杀稀有动物的人。保护濒临灭绝的动物是我们的责任。

sentences.chinese: 然而，它拥有六个语族，其中两个语族仅剩下一种语言，而且这儿几乎所有的语言都濒临灭绝。

detailed_translations.chinese: 濒危的， 将要灭绝的

name: highway

sentences.chinese: 75号州际公路

sentences.chinese: 警报系统的安装和维护

sentences.chinese: 整套电脑设备几乎是全新的。

sentences.chinese: 核设施

sentences.chinese: 然后是到处发生破产，只有以色列遭受了第二次巴勒斯坦人起义和到处开始的复苏的暴力行动的双重打击。

sentences.english: A major significant failure of the resurgence of market-oriented policies was a failure to reform the monetary system.
sentences.chinese: 以市场为导向的经济政策复苏的一个重要的大失败就是货币体系改革的失败。

name: compensation
trans: n. 补偿；报酬；赔偿金

sentences.english: People who are wrongly arrested may be paid compensation .
sentences.chinese: 被误抓的人有可能得到补偿费。

detailed_translations.english: money paid to someone because they have suffered injury or loss, or because something they own has been damaged

trans: adj. 预兆的；不吉利的

sentences.english: ‘How long will she be ill?’ he asked. There was an ominous silence.
sentences.chinese: “她的病多久会好？”他问。大家的沉默让人感觉不妙。

sentences.chinese: 运送药品、食品等宝贵物资的飞机

sentences.english: our planet’s precious resources
sentences.chinese: 我们星球上的宝贵资源

name: transform
trans: vt. 改变，使…变形；转换 vi. 变换，改变；转化

sentences.english: Increased population has transformed the landscape.
sentences.chinese: 人口的增加使景观发生了变化。

detailed_translations.english: to completely change the appearance, form, or character of something or someone, especially in a way that improves it

name: character

sentences.english: He has a cheerful but quiet character.
sentences.chinese: 他的性格乐观文静。

sentences.english: Everyone recognizes Disney’s cartoon characters.
sentences.chinese: 迪士尼的卡通人物尽人皆知。

sentences.english: The whole character of the school has changed.
sentences.chinese: 这所学校的特色已经完全变了。

detailed_translations.english: the particular combination of qualities that makes someone a particular type of person

name: climax
trans: n. 高潮；顶点；层进法；极点

sentences.chinese: 传统的烧船仪式将节庆活动推向了高潮。

sentences.chinese: 煤田发生劳资纠纷的风险

sentences.english: Marx points out the potential conflicts below the surface of society.
sentences.chinese: 马克思指出了隐藏在社会表层之下的潜在矛盾。

sentences.english: His views on the literal truth of the Bible brought him into conflict with other Christian leaders.
sentences.chinese: 他坚持《圣经》字面真理的观点使他与其他的基督教领袖发生了冲突。

sentences.english: Doctors exercise considerable power and often come into conflict with politicians.
sentences.chinese: 医生行使很大的权力，常常和政客们发生冲突。

sentences.english: a lawyer specializing in conflict resolution
sentences.chinese: 专门解决纠纷的律师

sentences.chinese: 一块两英亩的土地

name: setting
trans: n. 环境；安装；布置；[天] 沉落 v. 放置；沉没；使…处于某位置（set的ing形式）

sentences.english: I’ve worked with children in various settings, mainly in secondary school.
sentences.chinese: 我在许多地方教过孩子，主要是在中学。

sentences.chinese: 取暖系统已经调到了最高挡。

detailed_translations.english: the place where something is or where something happens, and the general environment

trans: n. 张力，拉力；紧张，不安；电压 vt. 使紧张；使拉紧

sentences.english: The tension was becoming unbearable, and I wanted to scream.
sentences.chinese: 这种紧张变得难以忍受，我真想大声尖叫。

sentences.english: Muscle tension can be a sign of stress.
sentences.chinese: 肌肉紧张可能是压力大的迹象。

sentences.english: This wire will take 50 pounds tension.
sentences.chinese: 这种金属线能承受50磅的张力。

sentences.english: In the wrong hands this powerful artifact has the ability to unravel the soul.
sentences.chinese: 在错误手这强有力的人工制品有能力解开灵魂。

trans: n. 文化，文明；修养；栽培 vt. [细胞][微] 培养（等于cultivate）

sentences.chinese: 我们在家说丹麦语，这样男孩子们就不会脱离他们的语言和文化。

sentences.english: In our culture, it is rude to ask someone how much they earn.
sentences.chinese: 在我们的文化里，问别人收入多少是不礼貌的。

sentences.english: I love working abroad and meeting people from diffe-rent cultures.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢在国外工作，认识来自不同文化的人。

detailed_translations.english: the beliefs, way of life, art, and customs that are shared and accepted by people in a particular society

trans: vt. 挖掘；开凿 vi. 发掘；细查

sentences.chinese: 谢里曼发掘出特洛伊古城。

detailed_translations.english: if a scientist or archaeologist excavates an area of land, they dig carefully to find ancient objects, bones etc

sentences.english: As one local resident put it in May, "By day there is government.
sentences.chinese: 正如一位当地居民在五月份对它的描述”白天有政府。

sentences.english: A resident said, "I think we should write it down on paper or tell our family members.
sentences.chinese: 一位居民说：“我觉得我们应该把遗嘱写在纸上或者告诉给自己的家人。

sentences.chinese: 她以前的同志，很少人能享受能这种舒适生活；不过另一个居民解释说，当局希望他们住在那以“进行宣传教育工作”。

name: settlement
trans: n. 解决，处理；[会计] 结算；沉降；殖民

sentences.chinese: 工会领导人和公司老板将于明天举行会议以期达成协议。

sentences.english: His lawyers are understood to be negotiating a settlement .
sentences.chinese: 据说他的律师正在商谈一个协议。

sentences.english: Hopes grew that a workable peace settlement might emerge.
sentences.chinese: 达成一项可行的和平协定的希望越来越大。

sentences.chinese: 根据离婚协议，她拿到了房子。

sentences.english: The company paid out over $10 million in an out-of-court settlement .
sentences.chinese: 这家公司花了1,000多万美元进行庭外和解。

detailed_translations.english: an official agreement or decision that ends an argument, a court case, or a fight, or the action of making an agreement

to tie together two ends or pieces of string, rope, cloth etc

sentences.chinese: 人类缺乏维生素C会引起坏血病，最终导致死亡。

sentences.chinese: 维生素摄入不足能导致坏血病、皮肤炎或干燥、鳞状皮肤之类的问题。

sentences.chinese: 而坏血病就是由于缺乏维他命而导致的，会引起皮疹，牙周病的症状，口臭就更不在话下。

sentences.chinese: 计算机化的数据收集系统

sentences.chinese: 他父亲死于心脏病。

sentences.chinese: 她在国外度假时染上了这种疾病。

sentences.chinese: 买房子之前作些了解，这想法很对。

sentences.chinese: 那家宾馆的气氛轻松愉快。

sentences.chinese: 家里的气氛很紧张。

sentences.chinese: 漂白剂的化学成分

sentences.chinese: 对土壤的化学分析

sentences.english: synthetic chemicals
sentences.chinese: 合成化学品

detailed_translations.english: relating to substances, the study of substances, or processes involving changes in substances
relating to substances, the study of substances, or processes involving changes in substances

name: fossil fuel
trans: [能源] 矿物燃料，[能源] 化石燃料

name: global warming
trans: 全球变暖

name: greenhouse effect

sentences.english: It's because of the greenhouse effect, and these islands belong to Maldives.
sentences.chinese: 因为温室效应呗，这些岛屿是属于马尔代夫的。

sentences.english: The star actor was NASA Godard Institute for Space Studies director James Hansen who claimed with 99 percent certainty that temperatures were rising due to a human-influenced "greenhouse effect".
sentences.chinese: 明星演员是美国宇航局戈达尔太空研究所所长詹姆斯·汉森，他声称有99%的把握，由于人类活动影响的“温室效应”，气温正在上升。

sentences.english: Other schemes entail the placement of giant orbiting mirrors to focus sunlight upon Mars’ polar icecaps, thus releasing liquid water and gaseous carbon dioxide to kick-start a greenhouse effect.
sentences.chinese: 此外，还要在火星轨道放置巨型反光镜，集中太阳光融化火星极地的冰盖，从而释放出液态的水和气态的二氧化碳制造温室效应。

sentences.chinese: 一对水晶耳环

sentences.english: This is actually just a microorganism. But it has roughly 500 genes.
sentences.chinese: 这其实只不过是一个微生物，却拥有约500个基因。

sentences.english: Spread the contents of the amber onto a petri dish containing a microorganism food like starch or soy.
sentences.chinese: 把琥珀内嵌标本放在皮氏培养皿中，并加入微生物食品，比如淀粉或大豆。

sentences.english: Slight mutations that allow a microorganism to resist the full killing power of a medicine are an evolutionary advantage that greatly expedites the development of drug resistance.
sentences.chinese: 略微的突变即可使微生物具有抵抗力，使药物完全失去杀伤力，这种突变是一个进化优势，大大加快了耐药性的产生。

detailed_translations.english: a living thing that is so small that it cannot be seen without a  microscope

name: microscope
trans: n. 显微镜

sentences.english: The slightest movement will defocus the microscope.
sentences.chinese: 最轻微的运动都会使显微镜散焦。

sentences.english: The microscope magnified the object two hundred times.
sentences.chinese: 这架显微镜把实物放大了200倍。

sentences.english: The microscope capacitates small objects to be observed.
sentences.chinese: 显微镜可以观察到微小的物体。

detailed_translations.english: a scientific instrument that makes extremely small things look larger

name: imports

name: independence
trans: n. 独立性，自立性；自主

sentences.english: The country has made great advances since independence.
sentences.chinese: 该国自独立以来发展迅速。

detailed_translations.chinese: 独立； 自主； 自立
detailed_translations.english: political freedom from control by the government of another country

name: sprawl
trans: v. 伸开四肢坐（或躺）；蔓延；杂乱无序地拓展 n. （城市）杂乱无序拓展的地区；四肢摊开的姿势；随意扩展；蔓延物

sentences.chinese: 他摊开手脚躺在沙发上。

sentences.english: I tripped on a stone and went sprawling on the pavement.
sentences.chinese: 我被一块石头绊了一下，四仰八叉地摔在人行道上。

sentences.chinese: 打得他四脚朝天的一拳

detailed_translations.chinese: 蔓生；伸开手足躺卧姿势

sentences.chinese: 言论自由的权利被写入美国宪法。

sentences.chinese: 她体质强壮，很快就会恢复。

sentences.english: What’s the chemical constitution of the dye?
sentences.chinese: 这种染料的化学成分是什么？

trans: v. 选举；选择，决定（做某事）；（上帝）挑选（某人）（使其灵魂永远得救） adj. 卓越的；蒙上帝挑选（而得救）的；当选（而尚未就职的） n. 被选的人；上帝的选民；特权集体

sentences.chinese: 该国第一个民主选举产生的政府

sentences.english: The latest incident is representative of a wider trend.

sentences.chinese: 现代技术对生物圈的影响在全世界是明显的。

sentences.chinese: 他们并不像法老、弥诺斯或美索不达米亚君主那样类似上帝的超人。

sentences.chinese: 在你定义项目的时候，你要确保和项目发起人在项目应该完成的所有工作内容上达成一致意见。

sentences.english: It is important that your sponsor be truly committed to the value of the project to ensure that funds and support are not in jeopardy if adoption is not immediate.
sentences.chinese: 发起人必须真正认可项目的价值，这一点很重要，只有这样才能确保在推广没有立即见效时资金和支持不会随之消失。

sentences.chinese: 传统的爱尔兰民歌

sentences.chinese: 传统的啤酒酿造方法

sentences.chinese: 她在一个拥有40种乐器的管弦乐队里当指挥。
